about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Get to know my journey
about.description1: My passion for technology started early, when I discovered the power of creating digital solutions that can transform people's lives. The possibility of developing applications that solve real problems and improve user experience captivated me deeply, motivating me to pursue a career in development.
about.description2: In March 2019, while still studying at UEMA, I began my professional journey as a fullstack freelancer. I developed various projects, from institutional websites and e-commerce platforms to management systems and customized web applications. Working as a fullstack freelancer, I learned to build all stages of the application from architecture, through development, testing and deployment. These projects provided me with practical experience with different technologies and frameworks, while teaching me the importance of delivering quality solutions within established deadlines.
about.description3: In July 2022, I took an important step in my career when I was hired as a Front-End developer. This experience allowed me to enhance my skills in developing modern and responsive interfaces, working with agile teams and collaborative development methodologies. By hiring me, you'll have access to a professional committed to technical excellence, who combines creativity in problem-solving with practical experience in real projects, always focused on delivering results that exceed expectations.
